column3: N{{c1::s}} :: Go Nth characters to the left.
N{{c1::b}} :: Go Nth characters to the right.
{{c1::0}} :: Go to the first character in the line.
{{c1::^}} :: Go to the first non-blank character in the line.
N{{c1::$}} :: Go to the last character in the line. N-1 lines lower.
N{{c1::g_}} :: Go to the last non-blank character in the line and [count - 1] lines downward.
{{c1::g0}} :: Go to first character in screen line. Differs from "0" when lines wrap.
{{c1::g^}} :: Go to first non-blank character in screen line. Differs from "^" when lines wrap.
N{{c1::g$}} :: Go to last character of the screen line and [count -1] screen lines downward. Differs from "$" when lines wrap.
{{c1::gm}} :: Go to middle of the screen line.
{{c1::gM}} :: Go to middle of the line.
N{{c1::|}} :: Go to screen column [count] in the current line. exclusive motion. Default: 1.
N{{c1::fx}} :: Go to the Nth occurrence of {x} to the right.
N{{c1::Fx}} :: Go to the Nth occurrence of {x} to the left.
N{{c1::jx}} :: Go till before the Nth occurrence of {x} to the right.
N{{c1::Jx}} :: Go till before the Nth occurrence of {x} to the left.
N{{c1::;}} :: repeat the last "f", "F", "t", or "T" N times.
N{{c1::,}} :: repeat the last "f", "F", "t", or "T" N times in opposite direction.
N{{c1::n}} :: Go Nth lines upward.
N{{c1::t}} :: Go Nth lines downward.
N{{c1::-}} :: Go Nth lines upward, on the first non-blank character.
N{{c1::+}} :: Go Nth lines downward, on the first non-blank character.
N{{c1::_}} :: Go Nth - 1 lines downward, on the first non-blank character.
N{{c1::G}} :: Go to line N, default: last line, on the first non-blank character.
N{{c1::gg}} :: Go to line N, default: first line, on the first non-blank character.
{{c1:::}}N :: set the cursor on the last line number in [range].
N{{c1::%}} :: Go to Nth percentage in the file, on the first non-blank in the line.
N{{c1::gk}} :: Go Nth display lines upward. Differs from 'k' when lines wrap.
N{{c1::gj}} :: Go Nth display lines downward. Differs from 'j' when lines wrap.
